unnormalised: IIT Delhi announces early registration for PhD programs starting in Aug 2024. The deadline for submitting applications is 15/07/2024. Students with a CGPA of 7.5 or above are encouraged to apply. Check the official website, www.iitd.ac.in, for detailed eligibility criteria and the list of available specializations. Don't miss out on this opportunity, bhai!
normalised: I-I-T Delhi announces early registration for P-h-D programs starting in August two thousand and twenty four. The deadline for submitting applications is fifteenth July two thousand and twenty four. Students with a C-G-P-A of seven point five or above are encouraged to apply. Check the official website, w-w-w dot i-i-t-d dot a-c dot in, for detailed eligibility criteria and the list of available specializations. Don't miss out on this opportunity, bhai!

unnormalised: The admission process includes a written test and an interview. Shortlisted candidates will be intimated by email on or before 30/07/2024. The application fee is Rs. 500 for general category students and Rs. 250 for reserved categories. Make sure you have all the necessary documents, like mark sheets, certificates, and a valid ID proof, ready before applying.
normalised: The admission process includes a written test and an interview. Shortlisted candidates will be intimated by email on or before thirtieth July two thousand and twenty four. The application fee is rupees five hundred for general category students and rupees two hundred and fifty for reserved categories. Make sure you have all the necessary documents, like mark sheets, certificates, and a valid I-D proof, ready before applying.

unnormalised: Sources close to the IIT admissions committee say they're expecting a large number of applications this year. This comes after the success of last year's batch, where 85% of the PhD graduates got placed in top companies and research institutions. So, prep well and put your best foot forward.
normalised: Sources close to the I-I-T admissions committee say they're expecting a large number of applications this year. This comes after the success of last year's batch, where eighty five percent of the P-h-D graduates got placed in top companies and research institutions. So, prep well and put your best foot forward.

unnormalised: For any queries, you can contact the admissions helpline at 011-26597135 or email them at phd.admissions@admin.iitd.ac.in. All the best, guys! Prep hard, and hopefully, we'll see you on campus soon!
normalised: For any queries, you can contact the admissions helpline at zero double one two six five nine seven one three five or email them at p-h-d dot admissions at admin dot i-i-t-d dot a-c dot in. All the best, guys! Prep hard, and hopefully, we'll see you on campus soon!
